answer:
Figure 1;

(a)(i) Desk drive 

(ii) (I). The technology used in the part labeled Z is disk (compact disk).

    (II). X for ON and OFF

    (III). Always clean the surface with a white cloth.

(b) Figure 2;

P;- It is used to view/see what the computer is doing.

Q;- It is the system unit where the computer memory is located.

R;- It is used to move round the screen of the monitor, it is used to give command to the computer.

S;- It is used to type/send in data into the computer.
